MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton, affecting customers on Lamancha and surrounding areas. Engineers are at Whim Farm cottage repairing a grounded conductor. We apologise for the prolonged period of time it is taking us to restore power and we still expect all power to be restored by 4pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15PM on Wednesday 20 January 2021.
